meanings.definition: A worker ant in a colony.
meanings.sent1: The ergates tirelessly carried food back to the anthill.
meanings.sent2: The ergates worked together with other ants to build a new tunnel.
meanings.sent3: The ergates accidentally dropped the sugar cube and caused a tiny ant traffic jam.
meanings.sent4: The ergates in the colony were like a well-oiled machine, each with their own role.
meanings.sent5: The ergates' teamwork and dedication ensured the survival of the ant colony.

meanings.sent1: The construction site was bustling with ergates carrying bricks and tools.
meanings.sent2: The ergates in the factory worked diligently to meet their production targets.
meanings.sent3: The ergates took a break and shared a joke during their lunch break.
meanings.sent4: The ergates in the fields toiled under the scorching sun, their hard work paying off at harvest time.
meanings.sent5: The ergates' determination and perseverance were evident in their daily tasks.
